Premises.Text: the role models within a family play a significant role in the development of the child's characteristics
in a traditional Turkish family, while a mother has a sincere and thoughtful approach to the child, a father role must be present as authoritarian and conversative to raise a well-behaved child
we are living in a society that puts a significant importance to gender equality in every aspect of the life, including relationships
a family formed by a woman with a housewife role who looks after the home and takes care of children and a man who brings money home can not be seen anymore in today's society
all of the couple duties are performed equally and interchangeably by individuals
having and raising children should not be different than any other daily activity
